title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When I press 'Finish' on the JAR packager wizard, it fails to create the JAR and displays the error message: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.
OB: When I try to create a JAR with unsaved editors, the packager reports the error 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
EB: I expected to be able to save the unsaved editors without quitting the wizard. If that is not allowed, there should be a dialog prompting me to save the unsaved editors before creating the JAR.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the JAR packager wizard. 2. Add some unsaved editors to the JAR. 3. Click on 'Finish' to create the JAR. 4. Observe the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
